channel.title: CVE Feed for Code Amp -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Code Amp -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-43305|2024-08-19T14:40:52.228Z -- code%20amp -- custom%20layouts%20%E2%80%93%20post%20%2B%20product%20grids%20made%20easy
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Code Amp Custom Layouts – Post + Product grids made easy allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Custom Layouts – Post + Product grids made easy: from n/a through 1.4.11.

item.title: CVE-2024-43305|2024-08-18T14:23:41.386Z -- code%20amp -- custom%20layouts%20%E2%80%93%20post%20%2B%20product%20grids%20made%20easy
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Code Amp Custom Layouts – Post + Product grids made easy allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Custom Layouts – Post + Product grids made easy: from n/a through 1.4.11.
